headline: Josh Shapiro makes campaign stop in Cumberland Co.
author: James Wesser
sentences: EAST PENNSBORO TOWNSHIP, Pa. (WHTM) — Gubernatorial candidate Josh Shapiro (D) made a campaign stop in East Pennsboro Township, Cumberland County on Thursday, March 24.
“Right now, we have an opportunity to put money back in the pockets of Pennsylvanians who are struggling, and I think we need to act right now,” Shapiro said.
abc27’s Dennis Owens is interviewing Josh Shaprio on This Week in Pennsylvania.” You can watch the program on Saturday at 7 p.m. and Sunday at 10 a.m.
He has proposed eliminating 11% state taxes on cell phones bills and expanding the state’s rent and property tax rebate program.
Shapiro also wants to send households $250 for each passenger vehicle they drive.

Shapiro is going on tour to promote his plan to help with inflation.
